scripts.preinit-applicationdb: dotnet ef --startup-project ../WebApp migrations add InitApplicationDbContext -c ApplicationDbContext -e Development
scripts.init-applicationdb: dotnet ef --startup-project ../WebApp database update -c ApplicationDbContext -e Development
scripts.preinit-datadb: dotnet ef --startup-project ../WebApp migrations add InitDataDbContext -c DataDbContext -e Development
scripts.init-datadb: dotnet ef --startup-project ../WebApp database update -c DataDbContext -e Development
